# bitrise_org_groups (Data Source)

Retrieves the list of groups for a Bitrise organization.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "bitrise_org_groups" "example" {
  org_slug = "my-organization"
}

output "groups" {
  value = data.bitrise_org_groups.example.groups
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `org_slug` (String) The slug of the Bitrise organization

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Data source identifier (org_slug)
- `groups` (List of Object) List of groups in the organization (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--groups))

<a id="nestedatt--groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `groups`

Read-Only:

- `slug` (String) The slug of the group
- `name` (String) The name of the group
